name: Cargo Bay (itch)
description:
Made for the Physics Jam (8 Bits to Infinity) 

Robots are invading your spaceship through the cargo bay! Good thing your ship has total artificial gravity. You can adjust the strength and direction. The robots have magnetic feet and wont be affected.... but if you release the cargo you can use it to smash into the robots. The cargo will only come out a small bit at a time, so keep launching cargo when you see more robots! Hopefully you can survive the onslaught. 

Programming & Gameplay: Simpathey 

Music & Sound: Calamilio
